translations: n.做抓和揪动作的人；阻截队员；抱住并摔倒对方抱球队员者

phrs.translation: 阻挡球员, 抢球, 做抓和揪动作的人, 抱球者

sentences.sentence: "He's more than just a tackler," he says.
He's good with his head, he's a good tackler, strong and plays man on man.
sentences.translation: 他的头球很好，他铲球很好，强壮，打盯人。

sentences.sentence: Rated as one of the best full-backs in Europe, he also has pace in abundance and has been described as a 'tenacious tackler'.
sentences.translation: 作为欧洲战场上数一数二的后卫，他还拥有出众的速度和意识，被誉为“顽强的防守者”。
